pulpMd --target=input.md --output=output.md
cmp output.md output.golden.md

-- input.md --
# Header {#custom}

| foo | bar | baz |
|---|---|---|
| some_name_foo | barbar | bazbaz |
| other _rich_ name | bar *bar* | `baz` baz `baz` |

-- output.golden.md --
Header {#custom}
================

| foo               | bar       | baz             |
|-------------------|-----------|-----------------|
| some_name_foo     | barbar    | bazbaz          |
| other *rich* name | bar *bar* | `baz` baz `baz` |
